解除安裝
%1 解除安裝
資訊
確認
錯誤

trans-unit.source: This will install %1. Do you wish to continue?
trans-unit.target: 這會安裝 %1。要繼續嗎?

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a temporary file. Setup aborted
trans-unit.target: 無法建立暫存檔。安裝已中止

trans-unit.source: Unable to execute file in the temporary directory. Setup aborted
trans-unit.target: 無法執行暫存目錄中的檔案。安裝已中止

trans-unit.source: The file %1 is missing from the installation directory. Please correct the problem or obtain a new copy of the program.
trans-unit.target: 安裝目錄中缺少檔案 %1。請修正問題，或重新取得程式的新複本。

trans-unit.source: The setup files are corrupted. Please obtain a new copy of the program.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式檔案已損毀。請重新取得該程式的複本。

trans-unit.source: The setup files are corrupted, or are incompatible with this version of Setup. Please correct the problem or obtain a new copy of the program.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式檔案已損毀，或不相容於與此版的安裝程式。請修正問題，或重新取得程式的新複本。

trans-unit.source: An invalid parameter was passed on the command line:%n%n%1
trans-unit.target: 在命令列上傳遞了無效的參數:%n%n%1
安裝程式已在執行中。

trans-unit.source: This program does not support the version of Windows your computer is running.
trans-unit.target: 此程式不支援電腦所執行的 Windows 版本。

trans-unit.source: This program requires %1 Service Pack %2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 此程式需要 %1 Service Pack %2 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: This program will not run on %1.
trans-unit.target: 此程式不會在 %1 上執行。

trans-unit.source: This program must be run on %1.
trans-unit.target: 此程式必須在 %1 上執行。

trans-unit.source: This program can only be installed on versions of Windows designed for the following processor architectures:%n%n%1
trans-unit.target: 此程式只可安裝在專為下列處理器架構設計的 Windows 版本上:%n%n%1

trans-unit.source: The version of Windows you are running does not include functionality required by Setup to perform a 64-bit installation. To correct this problem, please install Service Pack %1.
trans-unit.target: 您執行的 Windows 版本不含安裝程式執行 64 位元安裝所需的功能。若要修正此問題，請安裝 Service Pack %1。

trans-unit.source: This program requires %1 version %2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 此程式需要 %1 版 %2 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: This program cannot be installed on %1 version %2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 此程式無法安裝在 %1 版 %2 或更新版本上。

trans-unit.source: You must be logged in as an administrator when installing this program.
trans-unit.target: 安裝此程式時，必須以系統管理員身分登入。

trans-unit.source: You must be logged in as an administrator or as a member of the Power Users group when installing this program.
trans-unit.target: 當您安裝此程式時，必須以系統管理員或 Power Users 群組的成員身分登入。

trans-unit.source: Setup has detected that %1 is currently running.%n%nPlease close all instances of it now, then click OK to continue, or Cancel to exit.
trans-unit.target: 安裝時偵測到 %1 目前正在執行中。%n%n請立即關閉其所有執行個體。若要繼續，請按一下 [確定]; 若要結束，請按一下 [取消]。

trans-unit.source: Uninstall has detected that %1 is currently running.%n%nPlease close all instances of it now, then click OK to continue, or Cancel to exit.
trans-unit.target: 解除安裝時偵測到 %1 目前正在執行中。%n%n請立即關閉其所有執行個體。若要繼續，請按一下 [確定]; 若要結束，請按一下 [取消]。

trans-unit.source: Setup was unable to create the directory "%1"
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法建立目錄 "%1"

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a file in the directory "%1" because it contains too many files
trans-unit.target: 因為目錄 "%1" 包含太多檔案，所以無法在其中建立檔案
結束安裝

trans-unit.source: Setup is not complete. If you exit now, the program will not be installed.%n%nYou may run Setup again at another time to complete the installation.%n%nExit Setup?
trans-unit.target: 安裝未完成。若立即結束，將不會安裝程式。%n%n您可以稍後再執行安裝程式來完成安裝。%n%n要結束安裝嗎?

trans-unit.source: Select the language to use during the installation:
trans-unit.target: 選取安裝期間所要使用的語言:

trans-unit.source: Click Next to continue, or Cancel to exit Setup.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請按一下 [下一步]; 若要結束安裝，請按一下 [取消]。
瀏覽資料夾

trans-unit.source: Select a folder in the list below, then click OK.
trans-unit.target: 請從下列清單中選取資料夾，然後按一下 [確定]。
新資料夾
歡迎使用 [name] 安裝精靈

trans-unit.source: This will install [name/ver] on your computer.%n%nIt is recommended that you close all other applications before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 這會在您的電腦上安裝 [name/ver]。%n%n建議您先關閉所有其他應用程式，然後再繼續。
密碼
此安裝受密碼保護。

trans-unit.source: Please provide the password, then click Next to continue. Passwords are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 請提供密碼，然後按一下 [下一步] 以繼續。密碼區分大小寫。
密碼(&P):

trans-unit.source: The password you entered is not correct. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的密碼不正確。請再試一次。
授權合約

trans-unit.source: Please read the following important information before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 請先閱讀下列重要資訊，然後再繼續。

trans-unit.source: Please read the following License Agreement. You must accept the terms of this agreement before continuing with the installation.
trans-unit.target: 請閱讀下列授權合約。您必須接受此合約條款，才能繼續安裝。
我接受合約(&A)
我不接受合約(&D)
資訊

trans-unit.source: Please read the following important information before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 請先閱讀下列重要資訊，然後再繼續。

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to continue with Setup, click Next.
trans-unit.target: 當您準備好繼續安裝，請按一下 [下一步]。
資訊

trans-unit.source: Please read the following important information before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 請先閱讀下列重要資訊，然後再繼續。

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to continue with Setup, click Next.
trans-unit.target: 當您準備好繼續安裝，請按一下 [下一步]。
使用者資訊
請輸入您的資訊。
使用者名稱(&U):
組織(&O):
序號(&S):
必須輸入名稱。
選取目的地位置
應將 [name] 安裝在何處?

trans-unit.source: Setup will install [name] into the following folder.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式會將 [name] 安裝在下列資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: To continue, click Next. If you would like to select a different folder, click Browse.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請按一下 [下一步]。若要選取其他資料夾，請按一下 [瀏覽]。

trans-unit.source: At least [mb] MB of free disk space is required.
trans-unit.target: 至少須有 [mb] MB 的可用磁碟空間。

trans-unit.source: Setup cannot install to a network drive.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法安裝到網路磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: Setup cannot install to a UNC path.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法安裝到 UNC 路徑。

trans-unit.source: You must enter a full path with drive letter; for example:%n%nC:\APP%n%nor a UNC path in the form:%n%n\\server\share
trans-unit.target: 必須輸入包含磁碟機代號的完整路徑，例如:%n%nC:\APP%n%n或輸入下列格式的 UNC 路徑:%n%n\\伺服器\共用

trans-unit.source: The drive or UNC share you selected does not exist or is not accessible. Please select another.
trans-unit.target: 選取的磁碟機或 UNC 共用不存在或無法存取。請選取其他磁碟機或 UNC 共用。
磁碟空間不足

trans-unit.source: Setup requires at least %1 KB of free space to install, but the selected drive only has %2 KB available.%n%nDo you want to continue anyway?
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式至少需要 %1 KB 的可用空間才能安裝，但所選磁碟機的可用空間只有 %2 KB。%n%n仍要繼續嗎?

trans-unit.source: The folder name or path is too long.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾名稱或路徑過長。

trans-unit.source: The folder name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 此資料夾名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: Folder names cannot include any of the following characters:%n%n%1
trans-unit.target: 資料夾名稱不得包含下列任一字元:%n%n%1
資料夾已存在

trans-unit.source: The folder:%n%n%1%n%nalready exists. Would you like to install to that folder anyway?
trans-unit.target: 已有資料夾 %n%n%1%n%n。仍要安裝到該資料夾嗎?
資料夾不存在

trans-unit.source: The folder:%n%n%1%n%ndoes not exist. Would you like the folder to be created?
trans-unit.target: 資料夾 %n%n%1%n%n 不存在。要建立該資料夾嗎?
選取元件
應安裝哪些元件?

trans-unit.source: Select the components you want to install; clear the components you do not want to install. Click Next when you are ready to continue.
trans-unit.target: 選取您要安裝的元件; 清除您不要安裝的元件。當您準備好要繼續時，請按一下 [下一步]。

精簡安裝
自訂安裝

trans-unit.target: 安裝程式偵測到您的電腦已安裝了下列元件:%n%n%1%n%n將這些元件取消選取並不會使元件解除安裝。%n%n仍要繼續嗎?
%1 KB
%1 MB

trans-unit.source: Current selection requires at least [mb] MB of disk space.
trans-unit.target: 目前的選擇至少需要 [mb] MB 的磁碟空間。
選取其他工作

trans-unit.source: Which additional tasks should be performed?
trans-unit.target: 還須執行哪些其他工作?

trans-unit.source: Select the additional tasks you would like Setup to perform while installing [name], then click Next.
trans-unit.target: 請選取安裝程式在安裝 [name] 時，須額外執行的其他工作，然後按一下 [下一步]。
選取 [開始] 功能表資料夾

trans-unit.source: Where should Setup place the program's shortcuts?
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式應將程式捷徑置於何處?

trans-unit.source: Setup will create the program's shortcuts in the following Start Menu folder.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式將在下列 [開始] 功能表資料夾中建立程式捷徑。

trans-unit.source: To continue, click Next. If you would like to select a different folder, click Browse.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請按一下 [下一步]。若要選取其他資料夾，請按一下 [瀏覽]。

trans-unit.source: You must enter a folder name.
trans-unit.target: 必須輸入資料夾名稱。

trans-unit.source: The folder name or path is too long.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾名稱或路徑過長。

trans-unit.source: The folder name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 此資料夾名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: The folder name cannot include any of the following characters:%n%n%1
trans-unit.target: 資料夾名稱不得包含下列任一字元:%n%n%1
不要建立 [開始] 功能表資料夾(&D)
已可開始安裝

trans-unit.source: Setup is now ready to begin installing [name] on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式現在已可開始將 [name] 安裝到您的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Click Install to continue with the installation, or click Back if you want to review or change any settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續安裝，請按一下 [安裝]; 若要檢閱或變更任何設定，請按一下 [上一步]。

trans-unit.source: Click Install to continue with the installation.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續安裝，請按一下 [安裝]。
使用者資訊:
目的地位置:
安裝類型:
選取的元件:
[開始] 功能表資料夾:
其他工作:
正在準備安裝

trans-unit.source: Setup is preparing to install [name] on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式正在準備將 [name] 安裝到您的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The installation/removal of a previous program was not completed. You will need to restart your computer to complete that installation.%n%nAfter restarting your computer, run Setup again to complete the installation of [name].
trans-unit.target: 上一個程式的安裝/移除尚未完成。必須重新啟動電腦，才能完成該安裝。%n%n請在重新啟動電腦之後，重新執行安裝程式，以完成 [name] 的安裝。

trans-unit.source: Setup cannot continue. Please click Cancel to exit.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法繼續。請按一下 [取消] 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The following applications are using files that need to be updated by Setup. It is recommended that you allow Setup to automatically close these applications.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式必須更新下列應用程式正在使用的一些檔案。建議您允許安裝程式自動關閉這些應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following applications are using files that need to be updated by Setup. It is recommended that you allow Setup to automatically close these applications. After the installation has completed, Setup will attempt to restart the applications.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式必須更新下列應用程式正在使用的一些檔案。建議您允許安裝程式自動關閉這些應用程式。當安裝完成之後，安裝程式將會嘗試重新啟動這些應用程式。
自動關閉應用程式(&A)
不要關閉應用程式(&D)

trans-unit.source: Setup was unable to automatically close all applications. It is recommended that you close all applications using files that need to be updated by Setup before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法自動關閉所有應用程式。建議您關閉所有正在使用安裝程式必須更新之檔案的應用程式，然後再繼續。
正在安裝

trans-unit.source: Please wait while Setup installs [name] on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 請稍候，安裝程式正在將 [name] 安裝到您的電腦上。
正在完成 [name] 安裝精靈

trans-unit.source: Setup has finished installing [name] on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式已完成您電腦上 [name] 的安裝。

trans-unit.source: Setup has finished installing [name] on your computer. The application may be launched by selecting the installed icons.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式已完成您電腦上 [名稱] 的安裝。您可選取所安裝的圖示啟動應用程式。
請按一下 [完成]，以結束安裝。

trans-unit.source: To complete the installation of [name], Setup must restart your computer. Would you like to restart now?
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式必須重新啟動您的電腦，才能完成 [name] 的安裝。要立即重新啟動嗎?

trans-unit.source: To complete the installation of [name], Setup must restart your computer.%n%nWould you like to restart now?
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式必須重新啟動您的電腦，才能完成 [name] 的安裝。%n%n要立即重新啟動嗎?

trans-unit.source: Yes, I would like to view the README file
trans-unit.target: 是，我要檢視讀我檔案
是，立即重新啟動電腦(&Y)

trans-unit.source: &No, I will restart the computer later
trans-unit.target: 否，稍候再重新啟動電腦(&N)
執行 %1
檢視 %1
安裝程式需要下一張磁片。

trans-unit.source: Please insert Disk %1 and click OK.%n%nIf the files on this disk can be found in a folder other than the one displayed below, enter the correct path or click Browse.
trans-unit.target: 請插入磁片 %1，然後按一下 [確定]。%n%n若此磁片上的檔案可以在下列顯示之資料夾以外的資料夾中找到，請輸入正確的路徑，或按一下 [瀏覽]。
路徑(&P):

trans-unit.source: The file "%1" could not be located in "%2". Please insert the correct disk or select another folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 "%2" 中找不到檔案 "%1"。請插入正確的磁片，或選取其他資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Please specify the location of the next disk.
trans-unit.target: 請指定下一張磁片的位置。

trans-unit.source: Setup was not completed.%n%nPlease correct the problem and run Setup again.
trans-unit.target: 安裝未安成。%n%n請修正問題，再重新執行安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: Click Retry to try again, Ignore to proceed anyway, or Abort to cancel installation.
trans-unit.target: 若要再試一次，請按一下 [重試]; 若要繼續，請按一下 [忽略]; 若要取消安裝，請按一下 [中止]。

正在完成安裝...
正在重新啟動應用程式...

%1 失敗
%1 失敗; 代碼 %2
無法執行檔案:%n%1

建立登錄機碼時發生錯誤:%n%1\%2
寫入登錄機碼時發生錯誤:%n%1\%2

trans-unit.source: Error creating INI entry in file "%1".

trans-unit.source: Click Retry to try again, Ignore to skip this file (not recommended), or Abort to cancel installation.
trans-unit.target: 若要再試一次，請按一下 [重試]; 若要略過此檔案，請按一下 [忽略] (不建議使用); 若要取消安裝，請按一下 [中止]。

trans-unit.source: Click Retry to try again, Ignore to proceed anyway (not recommended), or Abort to cancel installation.
trans-unit.target: 若要再試一次，請按一下 [重試]; 若要繼續，請按一下 [忽略] (不建議使用); 若要取消安裝，請按一下 [中止]。

trans-unit.source: The source file "%1" does not exist
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔 "%1" 不存在

trans-unit.source: The existing file is marked as read-only.%n%nClick Retry to remove the read-only attribute and try again, Ignore to skip this file, or Abort to cancel installation.
trans-unit.target: 現有檔案已標記為唯讀。%n%n若要移除唯讀屬性，然後再試一次，請按一下 [重試]; 若要略過此檔案，請按一下 [忽略]; 若要取消安裝，請按一下 [中止]。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取現有檔案時發生錯誤:

trans-unit.source: The file already exists.%n%nWould you like Setup to overwrite it?
trans-unit.target: 已有此檔案。%n%n要由安裝程式加以覆寫嗎?

trans-unit.source: The existing file is newer than the one Setup is trying to install. It is recommended that you keep the existing file.%n%nDo you want to keep the existing file?
trans-unit.target: 現有檔案較安裝程式嘗試安裝的檔案新。建議您保留現有檔案。%n%n要保留現有的檔案嗎?

trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取原始程式檔時發生錯誤:

無法登錄 DLL/OCX: %1
RegSvr32 失敗，結束代碼為 %1

trans-unit.source: Unable to register the type library: %1
trans-unit.target: 無法登錄類型程式庫: %1

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to open the README file.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試開啟讀我檔案時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Setup was unable to restart the computer. Please do this manually.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式無法重新啟動電腦。請手動執行此作業。

trans-unit.source: File "%1" does not exist. Cannot uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 沒有檔案 "%1"。無法解除安裝。

trans-unit.source: File "%1" could not be opened. Cannot uninstall
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟檔案 "%1"。無法解除安裝

trans-unit.source: The uninstall log file "%1" is in a format not recognized by this version of the uninstaller. Cannot uninstall
trans-unit.target: 此版解除安裝程式無法辨識解除安裝記錄檔 "%1" 的格式。無法解除安裝

trans-unit.source: An unknown entry (%1) was encountered in the uninstall log
trans-unit.target: 在解除安裝記錄中找到不明的項目 (%1)

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to completely remove %1? Extensions and settings will not be removed.
trans-unit.target: 確定要完全移除 %1 嗎? 將不會移除延伸模組和設定。

trans-unit.source: This installation can only be uninstalled on 64-bit Windows.
trans-unit.target: 只可在 64 位元 Windows 上解除安裝此安裝。

trans-unit.source: This installation can only be uninstalled by a user with administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 只有具備系統管理權限的使用者，才能解除安裝此安裝。

trans-unit.source: Please wait while %1 is removed from your computer.
trans-unit.target: 正在從您的電腦移除 %1，請稍候。

trans-unit.source: %1 was successfully removed from your computer.
trans-unit.target: 已成功從您的電腦移除 %1。

trans-unit.source: %1 uninstall complete.%n%nSome elements could not be removed. These can be removed manually.
trans-unit.target: 解除安裝 %1 已完成。%n%n有部分項目無法移除。您可以手動加以移除。

trans-unit.source: To complete the uninstallation of %1, your computer must be restarted.%n%nWould you like to restart now?
trans-unit.target: 若要完成 %1 的解除安裝，必須重新啟動您的電腦。%n%n要立即重新啟動嗎?
"%1" 檔案已損毀。無法解除安裝
要移除共用檔案嗎?

trans-unit.source: The system indicates that the following shared file is no longer in use by any programs. Would you like for Uninstall to remove this shared file?%n%nIf any programs are still using this file and it is removed, those programs may not function properly. If you are unsure, choose No. Leaving the file on your system will not cause any harm.
trans-unit.target: 系統指出已無任何程式在使用下列共用檔案。您要解除安裝，以移除此共用檔案嗎?%n%n如有任何程式仍在使用此檔案而將該檔案移除，這些程式可能無法正常運作。若不確定，請選擇 [否]。將檔案保留在系統上並不會造成任何不良影響。
檔案名稱:
位置:
解除安裝狀態
正在解除安裝 %1...
正在安裝 %1。
正在解除安裝 %1。
其他圖示:
建立桌面圖示(&D)
建立快速啟動圖示(&Q)
Web 上的 %1
解除安裝 %1
啟動 %1
關聯 %1 與 %2 副檔名(&A)
正在建立 %1 與 %2 副檔名的關聯…
啟動:
自動啟動 %1

trans-unit.source: %1 could not be located in the folder you selected.%n%nDo you want to continue anyway?
trans-unit.target: 在選取的資料夾中找不到 %1。%n%n仍要繼續嗎?
